backend/main.mo: Defines an actor with a transform query using OutCall and a helper to perform HTTP GET requests with transformation.
feature_evidence.json: Reports feature mappings to impacted frontend files, components, and test IDs for dashboard header, CO₂ parsing, and CO₂ chart labeling changes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Human-written summaries describing roles of various frontend files, including pages, charts, hooks, styles, and assets.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light/dark modes, chart colors, and global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that sets the app title and loads the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that renders the TemperatureDashboardPage.
frontend/src/components/CO2Chart.tsx: Recharts-based CO₂ chart showing three percentage-series with formatted axes, tooltips, legend, and brush-based zoom sync.
frontend/src/components/TemperatureChart: Recharts temperature chart rendering filtered and CSV series with fixed °F range, tooltip formatting, legend, and zoom brush.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, login flow, stored identities, and AuthClient creation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file reserved for future backend query definitions.
frontend/src/hooks/useSyncedTimeWindow.t: Hook managing shared chart zoom ranges with utilities to set, reset, and compute visible indices.
React Query hook that fetches temperature data periodically and exposes loading, error, refetch, and last-updated state.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light/dark theme variables, global colors, layout, and chart color tokens.
frontend/src/lib/temperatureDataSource.t: Fetches raw JSON from a Google Apps Script endpoint and parses it into structured TemperatureDataPoint values.
frontend/src/lib/temperatureParsing.ts: Parses raw temperature/CO₂ data, normalizing numbers and timestamps, filtering invalid entries, and sorting chronologically.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React Query, identity provider, global CSS, and rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/TemperatureDashboardP: Dashboard page rendering temperature and CO₂ charts with theme toggle, refresh controls, and synced time window state.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, custom colors from CSS variables, extended fonts, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Metadata file describing the project’s state, requirements, architecture, known issues, and feature list.
